title: Radiation Therapy Phys
description: Measurement and calculation of absorbed dose, dose distributions, treatment planning, photon teletherapy, electron teletherapy, brachytherapy, clinical linear accelerators, quality assurance.

__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: HP 6756 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MP 6756 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or NRE 6756 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
